00037 void CoordsTest::CreationTest()
00038 {
00039         FPoint fpt;
00040     // quell compiler warning of unused var
00041     fpt.x = 8.0f;
00042         FRegion frgn;
00043         FGridCoords fgrid;
00044         Region rgn;
00045         Point pt;
00046     // quell compiler warning of unused var
00047     pt.x = 8;
00048         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( 1 );
00049 }

00051 void CoordsTest::CastFRegionToFGridCoordsTest()
00052 {
00053         FRegion rgn;
00054         FPoint pt = {8.0f, 7.0f};
00055         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00056         pt.x = 3.0f;
00057         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00058         pt.y = 2.0f;
00059         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00060         pt.x = 11.0f;
00061         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00062 
00063         FGridCoords grid;
00064         grid = (FGridCoords)rgn;
00065 
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperleft.x == 8.0f);
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperleft.y == 7.0f);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperright.x == 3.0f);
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperright.y == 7.0f);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerright.x == 3.0f);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerright.y == 2.0f);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerleft.x == 11.0f);
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerleft.y == 2.0f);
00074 }
00075 
00076 void CoordsTest::CastRegionToGridCoordsTest()
00077 {
00078         Region rgn;
00079         Point pt = {8, 7};
00080         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00081         pt.x = 3;
00082         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00083         pt.y = 2;
00084         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00085         pt.x = 11;
00086         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00087 
00088         GridCoords grid;
00089         grid = (GridCoords)rgn;
00090 
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperleft.x == 8);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperleft.y == 7);
00093         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperright.x == 3);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.upperright.y == 7);
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerright.x == 3);
00096         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerright.y == 2);
00097         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerleft.x == 11);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.lowerleft.y == 2);
00099 }

00101 void CoordsTest::FGridCoordsIsEmptyTest()
00102 {
00103         FGridCoords grid;
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.IsEmpty());
00105         grid.lowerleft.x = 1.0f;
00106         grid.lowerleft.y = 1.0f;
00107         grid.lowerright = grid.upperright = grid.upperleft = grid.lowerleft;
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.IsEmpty());
00109 }
00110 void CoordsTest::GridCoordsIsEmptyTest()
00111 {
00112         GridCoords grid;
00113         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.IsEmpty());
00114         grid.lowerleft.x = 1;
00115         grid.lowerleft.y = 1;
00116         grid.lowerright = grid.upperright = grid.upperleft = grid.lowerleft;
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(grid.IsEmpty());
00118 }

00120 void CoordsTest::CastFGridCoordsToFRegionTest()
00121 {
00122         FGridCoords grid;
00123         grid.lowerleft.x = 1.0f;
00124         grid.lowerleft.y = 1.2f;
00125         grid.lowerright.x = 11.0f;
00126         grid.lowerright.y = 14.2f;
00127         grid.upperright.x = 111.0f;
00128         grid.upperright.y = 114.2f;
00129         grid.upperleft.x = 1001.0f;
00130         grid.upperleft.y = 1200.2f;
00131 
00132         FRegion r = (FRegion)grid;
00133         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts.size() == 4);
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerLeft].x == 1.0f);
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerLeft].y == 1.2f);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerRight].x == 11.0f);
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerRight].y == 14.2f);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperRight].x == 111.0f);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperRight].y == 114.2f);
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperLeft].x == 1001.0f);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperLeft].y == 1200.2f);
00142 }
00143 
00144 void CoordsTest::CastGridCoordsToRegionTest()
00145 {
00146         GridCoords grid;
00147         grid.lowerleft.x = 1;
00148         grid.lowerleft.y = 1;
00149         grid.lowerright.x = 11;
00150         grid.lowerright.y = 14;
00151         grid.upperright.x = 111;
00152         grid.upperright.y = 114;
00153         grid.upperleft.x = 1001;
00154         grid.upperleft.y = 1200;
00155 
00156         Region r = (Region)grid;
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts.size() == 4);
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerLeft].x == 1);
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerLeft].y == 1);
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerRight].x == 11);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[LowerRight].y == 14);
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperRight].x == 111);
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperRight].y == 114);
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperLeft].x == 1001);
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(r.pts[UpperLeft].y == 1200);
00166 }

00196 void CoordsTest::FRegionClearTest()
00197 {
00198         FRegion rgn;
00199         FPoint pt = {8.0f, 7.0f};
00200         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00201         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rgn.pts.size() == 1);
00202         rgn.Clear();
00203         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rgn.pts.size() == 0);
00204 }

00206 void CoordsTest::RegionClearTest()
00207 {
00208         Region rgn;
00209         Point pt = {8, 7};
00210         rgn.pts.push_back(pt);
00211         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(rgn.pts.size() == 1);
00212         rgn.Clear();
